metadata.title: CVE-2020-22218 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in function _libssh2_packet_add in libssh2 1.10.0allows attackers to access out of bounds memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssh2-1 - 1.8.0-2.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libssh2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-2.1ubuntu0.1').
